prescriptions.instructions: Take 1 tablet by mouth every 8 hours for 7 days. Swallow the tablet whole with a full glass of water. Do not crush or chew the tablet.
Take 1 tablet by mouth once daily in the morning. May be taken with or without food.
Take 1 tablet by mouth once daily. Take with a glass of water. Do not take with grapefruit juice.
Take 1 tablet by mouth twice daily with meals. Swallow the tablet whole. Do not crush or chew.
Inhale 2 puffs every 4-6 hours as needed for asthma. Rinse your mouth with water after each use to prevent oral thrush.
Take 1 capsule by mouth once daily before a meal. Swallow the capsule whole. Do not crush or chew.
Take 1 tablet by mouth once daily in the evening. Take with a full glass of water. Do not take with grapefruit juice.
Take 1 tablet by mouth once daily on an empty stomach. Wait at least 30 minutes before eating or drinking anything other than water.
Take 1 capsule by mouth three times daily. Swallow the capsule whole. Do not crush or chew.
